@title LobbyFactory
 @notice Factory that deploys independent Match contracts and keeps
         a lightweight registry for frontend querying.
         Each match is its own contract — this factory only stores
         addresses so the frontend can discover them.  No mutable
         game state lives here; everything is inside the Match
         contracts, enabling Monad parallelism.

@notice Submit results for a match. Only factory owner (oracle).
         This is the trusted backend channel.
@notice Factory can cancel any match (admin override).
@notice Returns addresses of all matches that are still Open.
@notice Get info for a specific match.
@notice Total number of matches ever created.
@notice Retrieve a page of all match addresses.

@title Match
 @notice A single, independently-deployed match contract.
         Each match is its own contract — no shared mutable state across
         matches, enabling Monad's parallel EVM to process concurrent
         matches without contention.
         Players join by sending the exact entry fee as native MON.
         Once all slots are filled the match is InProgress.
         The factory (admin) submits final scores; prize pool is
         distributed based on placement.
         Prize distribution:
           2  players → 1st: 100%
           4  players → 1st: 60%, 2nd: 40%
           8  players → 1st: 50%, 2nd: 30%, 3rd: 20%
           16 players → 1st: 40%, 2nd: 25%, 3rd: 20%, 4th: 15%
@notice Join this match by sending exactly `entryFee` MON.
@notice Factory-only: join on behalf of a player (for createMatch auto-join).

@notice Cancel the match. Refunds all players.
         Only the creator (before InProgress) or factory can cancel.

@dev Compute prize distribution array based on lobby size.
      Returns an array of payout amounts summing to `pool`.
        2  → [100%]
        4  → [60%, 40%]
        8  → [50%, 30%, 20%]
        16 → [40%, 25%, 20%, 15%]

Each match is its own contract \u2014 no shared mutable state across         matches, enabling Monad's parallel EVM to process concurrent         matches without contention.         Players join by sending the exact entry fee as native MON.         Once all slots are filled the match is InProgress.         The factory (admin) submits final scores; prize pool is         distributed based on placement.         Prize distribution:           2  players \u2192 1st: 100%           4  players \u2192 1st: 60%, 2nd: 40%           8  players \u2192 1st: 50%, 2nd: 30%, 3rd: 20%           16 players \u2192 1st: 40%, 2nd: 25%, 3rd: 20%, 4th: 15%","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/Match.sol":"Match"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"contracts/Match.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd6e8201202050cdce5cec4037561960400aafe7f1925a08a20d9161a4db51c4e","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://043cd985a1ac2be01a7b8b2f1748aaad2de229e5ced3040e1b9a5b3a3bc81e4f","dweb:/ipfs/QmbXFads1fFDrZi9Gu29aKE3VosB8QnCBYnkfHvXnpsAne"]}},"version":1}
